shortIntro.title: What Your Device Needs to Kick Goals Smoothly ‚öΩ
shortIntro.para1: EA Sports Football is a high-action soccer game with detailed stadiums, realistic player animations, and smooth ball physics. If your device is weak, expect missed passes, laggy tackles, and goals that feel like they happen in slow motion üê¢.
shortIntro.para2: Low-end devices can manage casual matches at 25‚Äì30 FPS, while mid-range and high-end devices will let you dribble past defenders and score stunning goals at 60 FPS or higher. And yes, your celebrations will look epic! üéâ

faqIntroText: Most common questions from football fans who love smooth gameplay and epic goals ü•Ö:

faqList.question: Is EA Sports Football heavy on devices?
faqList.answer: Yes. Detailed stadiums, real-time physics, and player animations require strong GPUs and fast storage.

faqList.question: Can I play at 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes, but only on mid-range to high-end devices with capable GPUs.

faqList.question: Why does my phone heat up during matches?
faqList.answer: The game renders players, stadiums, physics, and multiplayer interactions in real-time. On low-end devices, this can generate heat üî•.
